name: Mesh

Headline: Mesh helps organizations 4x their chances of hitting business goals by increasing their high performer density!
ShortDescription: At Mesh, we’ve reimagined boring old corporate software for managing goals/OKRs, feedback & performance reviews into a simple social network.

Highlights.name: Next-Best Action Driven User Experience
Highlights.description: Move away from expecting managers and talent to be quasi-HR experts. Mesh’s relatable social user interface and machine learning-driven next-best action philosophy help you drive continuous check-ins, real-time feedback, and coaching conversations.

Highlights.name: Habit Formation via AI Nudges
Highlights.description: Don’t let the need for a vast process or guidelines get in your way of improving performance. Mesh delivers contextual nudges to individual contributors and managers leveraging GenAI. This helps build the habit of timely peer, manager, and team check-ins.

Highlights.name: Real-Time Insights That Enable Managers
Highlights.description: Stop leaving managers in a dark hole of performance and development data for their teams. Mesh combines disjointed data across disparate processes and conversations to deliver insights into managers’ flow of work. This enables them to foresee risks, visualize trends, and recommend development actions with our AI-based insights.

enhanced_description: Mesh is an HR technology solution that transforms traditional corporate software for managing goals/OKRs, feedback, and performance reviews into an engaging social network. It provides employees with visibility and personalized growth nudges, while offering leaders predictive insights to improve business outcomes and increase high performer density. Leveraging machine learning and Generative AI, Mesh drives continuous check-ins, real-time feedback, and coaching conversations through a 'next-best action' driven social user experience. It delivers contextual nudges to foster habits of timely peer, manager, and team check-ins. Managers gain real-time, AI-based insights by combining disparate performance and development data, enabling them to foresee risks, visualize trends, and recommend development actions, ultimately helping organizations 4x their chances of hitting business goals.
roi_benefits: Increased Likelihood of Hitting Business Goals
